annotation.TEXT: Earth Man is the other newly implemented boss of the main Robot Masters. He does just about what you'd expect him to: Slam the floor, cause the room to shake, throw rocks, etc. He does have one other unique attack in the form of drill projectiles, which have a rather strict timing when it comes to jumping over them.

Hawk Seeker is pretty decent as far as homing weapons go. While it doesn't have as much ammo as Spear Shot, it still has 28 uses, and it deals just as much damage. Killing an enemy with a Hawk also causes it to keep going, tracking the other nearest enemy in the process.

Speed Drill is probably the most lack-luster weapon in the whole game. It deals roughly the same amount of damage as a normal buster shot, with the only real perk being that you can have 4 on-screen at the same time. Unless you're fighting Coppice Man, you're better off using Spears, Double Shock, or Seasonal Barrier.

Frost Arrow is another "meh" weapon. It doesn't deal that much base damage, though it does trap the enemies it kills in a block of ice. Said frozen enemies then explode into several large icicles that cover almost the entire screen. This might sound awesome, but the problem is this explosion has start-up time. By comparison, it's much faster just to use Blaring Blast to get the same effect.
